info.name: Microsoft M F A
info.description: The Nextcloud app provides an additional layer of security by enforcing multi-factor authentication using the Microsoft Authenticator app. Users are prompted to set up this method to access their data. For those who haven't set up multi-factor authentication yet, the app offers a simple option for setup within the platform, allowing users to enhance the security of their accounts effectively.
info.author: Besfort Ajeti
